hero.title: Premium Medical Travel to Guangxi, China
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class healthcare combined with the natural beauty of Guangxi. From traditional Chinese medicine to modern treatments, we provide comprehensive medical travel services.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Guangxi for Medical Travel

quality.title: World-Class Healthcare
quality.description: Access to top-rated hospitals with internationally trained doctors and cutting-edge medical technology.

cost.title: Affordable Excellence
cost.description: Receive premium medical care at a fraction of the cost compared to Western countries.

recovery.title: Recover in Paradise
recovery.description: Guilin is famous for its stunning karst mountain scenery along the Li River. After your medical treatment, enjoy a peaceful recovery surrounded by one of China's most beautiful natural landscapes.
items: Li River cruise through karst mountains
